Posts.Content: Hi. I am on the tomotherapy to my clavicle area and medistinum.  i have not rash(18 so far-12 more to go).  I don't feel the lump down too much, but it is down.  This Sucks!
Posts.Title: tomotherapy rash???

Posts.Content: OMG! I am a nervous wreck! Just finished chemo (12-10), second time around.  Noticed this lump above my right clavicle and my throat has been hurting. Went to ent-nothing, went to pulmonary-inhalers. Just went to oncologist yesterday, and he is concerned. Having a CT Scan on Tuesday.  I AM SO FREAKING OUT!!!!!!! CAN'T GO THROUGH ANYMORE! [Edit] [Delete]
Posts.Title: Lump Under Right Clavicle!

Posts.Content: Just read two links about ace inhibitors (blood pressure meds), that there can be a 56% inc in recurrence. I've been on one named-lisinopril for 1 1/2 years, and developed breast ca again. Interesting....
Posts.Title: Ace Inhibitors-Cause recurrence bc

Posts.Content: YUCH! SHIT!  Anyone in same situation?  Would love to hear from you.  I am starting rads on Tuesday. Shari
Posts.Title: supraclavicular breast ca

Posts.Content: OMG! Just went to oncologist.  Had a biopsy on Monday, and came back as same type as breast cancer. His plans, pet scan (on Monday), see oncol. neck surgeon,and possibly rads. I just finished chemo in December. Anyone else with similar situation?  Would love to hear from you. Going to see another oncologist tomorrow, and possibly one more in AnnArbor Mi.
Posts.Title: Lump in Neck-POSITIVE-FROM BREAST CA
